mapper.select: SELECT A.USR_ID "usrId" , A.USR_NM "usrNm" , A.USR_PW "usrPw" , A.REG_DT "regDt" , A.CHNG_USR_ID "chngUsrId" , A.CHNG_DT "chngDt" , A.LANG_CLCD "language" , A.ROLE "role" , role.NAME "roleNm" FROM SAM_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAM_CODE role ON (A.role = role.code AND role.code_group = 'ROLE') WHERE A.USR_ID = #{usrId}

SELECT A.USR_ID "usrId" , A.USR_NM "usrNm" , A.USR_PW "usrPw" , A.REG_DT "regDt" , A.CHNG_USR_ID "chngUsrId" , A.CHNG_DT "chngDt" , role.NAME "roleNm" , A.LANG_CLCD "language" FROM TDT_USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAM_CODE role ON (A.role = role.code AND role.code_group = 'ROLE') WHERE 1=1
